title: Rational design and investigation of nonlinear optical response properties of pyrrolopyrrole aza-BODIPY-based novel push–pull chromophores
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15560-15570
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02861A, Paper

Naga Pranava Sree Kothoori, Pandiyan Sivasakthi, Mallesham Baithy, Ramprasad Misra, Pralok K. Samanta
Intramolecular charge transfer plays crucial role in shaping linear and nonlinear optical response properties of novel pyrrolopyrrole aza-BODIPY-based push–pull chromophores.
